entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 4:00 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: NNE 37 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 late this evening then light before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023
